chapter.title: Pretty Printing with GPP (*)
chapter.para: The GPP package is a tool suite for generic pretty-printing. GPP supports pretty-printing of parse-trees in the AsFix format with comment preservation and of abstract syntax trees. GPP supports the output formats plain text, LaTeX, and HTML. Formattings are defined in pretty print tables, which can be generated from SDF syntax definitions.

section.title: Pretty Printing using Stratego (*)
section.para: In this section, we explain how you can use Box in Stratego to implement a pretty-printer by hand.
